mapper.sql: item_id as itemId, commission_rate as commissionRate, guarantee_rate as guaranteeRate, prepaid_bonus as prepaidBonus, loan_mode as loanMode, first_ratio as firstRatio, sponsor_idcard as sponsorIdcard, sponsor_credit as sponsorCredit, principal_idcard as principalIdcard, principal_credit as principalCredit, business_licence as businessLicence, venue_rental_agreement as venueRentalAgreement, store_renderings as storeRenderings, corporate_articles as corporateArticles, asset_water_liabilities as assetWaterLiabilities, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, operate_account as operateAccount
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO (item_id, commission_rate, guarantee_rate, prepaid_bonus, loan_mode, first_ratio, sponsor_idcard, sponsor_credit, principal_idcard, principal_credit, business_licence, venue_rental_agreement, store_renderings, corporate_articles, asset_water_liabilities, create_time, operate_account) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{commissionRate}, #{guaranteeRate}, #{prepaidBonus}, #{loanMode}, #{firstRatio}, #{sponsorIdcard}, #{sponsorCredit}, #{principalIdcard}, #{principalCredit}, #{businessLicence}, #{venueRentalAgreement}, #{storeRenderings}, #{corporateArticles}, #{assetWaterLiabilities}, #{createTime}, #{operateAccount})
mapper.update:
UPDATE
commission_rate=#{commissionRate},
guarantee_rate=#{guaranteeRate},
prepaid_bonus=#{prepaidBonus},
loan_mode=#{loanMode},
first_ratio=#{firstRatio},
sponsor_idcard=#{sponsorIdcard},
sponsor_credit=#{sponsorCredit},
principal_idcard=#{principalIdcard},
principal_credit=#{principalCredit},
business_licence=#{businessLicence},
venue_rental_agreement=#{venueRentalAgreement},
store_renderings=#{storeRenderings},
corporate_articles=#{corporateArticles},
asset_water_liabilities=#{assetWaterLiabilities},
operate_account=#{operateAccount},
item_id = #{itemId}
